page.title: 03TRAFFIC - A CHILDS VIEW
page.content: A lot of traffic passes through Dartford everyday because it is between London and the coast. Lowfield Street is one of the busiest streets because it runs right through the town. There are many accidents on Dartford's roads and some are fatal. There are plenty of places for cars to park but not many petrol stations or garages. In the summer of 1985 road works are taking place where Watlng Street crosses over the A.2. They are widening the sliproad to the Dartford Tunnel and strengthening the bridge. Also, down Princes Road, pipes are being laid. This is causing congestion in the town and roads around it. A one way traffic system is in operation in Dartford. This helps the traffic flow, but is often found confusing by new or casual users.
